source:
TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_SEQ_00Damielliot has the flustered look of a man who has been asked one too many questions.

※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_SEQ_00* Cette quête est un événement à durée limitée.

Damielliot voudrait faire plaisir aux enfants.

source:
TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_SEQ_01While your impromptu Little Ladies' Day at Frondale's Phrontistery was a rousing success, Damielliot informs you that not all is well. It would seem Redolent Rose's visit was both a blessing and a curse, as the other young girls now expect Damielliot to arrange a special guest for each of them. The children's requests are fanciful at best, and Damielliot, overwhelmed with the magnitude of the task, humbly requests your aid in securing audiences with some of the storied figures you have met in your journeys. Reauverre has asked each of the girls to write a letter to the person─or persons─they would like to meet. Read them, and if anyone you know might fit the descriptions contained within, inform Reauverre and he will summon the others to the foyer.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_SEQ_01Cette quête ne peut être commencée et effectuée que pendant la durée de l'événement saisonnier correspondant. Pour plus de détails, veuillez consulter The Lodestone.

D'après Damielliot, votre idée de faire venir Redolent Rose à la clinique a été victime de son succès, et chaque petite fille ne désire désormais plus qu'une chose: rencontrer son modèle! Le docteur pense qu'avec votre réseau particulièrement étendu, vous pourriez leur donner satisfaction. Lisez d'abord les lettres que les fillettes ont écrites, sur le comptoir de la clinique, et voyez si elles vous évoquent des connaissances. Ceci fait, parlez à Reauverre.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_SEQ_02<tab>Everyone awaits with bated breath as you present to them one of Eorzea's most esteemed personages. The children are delighted to hear their stories and receive their advice, and your guests appear just as delighted to share. The meeting ends with smiles all around, and Damielliot is eager to thank you for your part in arranging it.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_SEQ_02<tab>Comme convenu, vous avez fait venir l'une de vos con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ces à la clinique. Votre hôte a su toucher le cœur de son jeune auditoire avec des mots pleins de profondeur, avant de prendre congé. Parlez à présent à Damielliot.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_SEQ_03<tab>After thanking you profusely, Damielliot reiterates that you are welcome to visit the Phrontistery at any time, so long as the day's festivities are afoot in Ul'dah. He also reminds you that the children would be thrilled if you were to bring even just one more of your colorful comrades along with you.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_SEQ_03<tab>Damielliot s'est félicité de la réaction des jeunes demoiselles, et vous a <var 08 E905 ((invitée)) ((invité)) /var> à réitérer l'expérience à l'occasion. Les mentors n'ont pas fini de se presser aux portes de la clinique<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_000<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I am terribly sorry to trouble you again so soon, but may I have a word?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((Aventurière)) ((Aventurier)) /var>, je ne voudrais pas abuser de votre temps, mais il se trouve que j'ai un petit souci...

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_001<tab>As you know, our dear Lorie was overjoyed to receive a personal visit from Redolent Rose, whom she so admires. So very few are given such an opportunity, and I shall be forever grateful to you for your part in arranging it.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_001<tab>Comme vous avez pu le constater, la visite de maître Redolent Rose a enchanté Lorie. C'était vraiment une brillante idée de votre part de l'inviter. Seulement voilà...

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_002<tab>However, Lorie is not the only one under our care. When the other children heard her story, they came asking me to invite all manner of illustrious figures to the ward.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_002<tab>À présent, les autres petites filles aussi veulent rencontrer <var 1A 02 /var>leur<var 1A 01 /var> modèle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_003<tab>Of course, I would gladly grant their wishes if I could. However, I am but a lowly physician, and hold little sway outside of this Phrontistery. I do not sup with the sultana or go for leisurely flights on the backs of dragons.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_003<tab>J'aurais bien aimé leur faire plaisir, mais je ne connais pas tant de monde que ça en dehors de l'Académie...

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_004<tab>But an adventurer of your stature is no stranger to esteemed company, both within and without this city. The children and I would be eternally grateful if you would draw upon this circle of acquaintances to make their dreams come true one more time.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_004<tab>En tant qu'<var 08 E905 ((aventurière)) ((aventurier)) /var>, votre carnet d'adresses doit être plus fourni que le mien... Si par hasard vous avez des con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ces aux parcours par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>rement inspirants, pourriez-vous les inviter pour moi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_005<tab>I sincerely apologize for imposing upon you yet again, but it is not for my own sake that I beseech your aid. In return for your efforts, I have arranged a reward, but I fear it will only begin to repay the debt I already owe you.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_005<tab>Désolé, je vous en demande beaucoup, mais c'est la seule solution pour qu'il n'y ait pas de jalouses... En contrepartie, vous aurez droit à un petit cadeau de ma part.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_100_005<tab>Young Reauverre, emboldened by your example, has chosen to serve as seneschal to our young ladies, and has helped sort all of their various requests.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_100_005<tab>Pour ce qui est des détails, je laisse la parole à notre jeune sénéchal Reauverre.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_REAUVERRE_000_006<tab>I asked them to write letters to the people they wanted to meet, although it seems not everyone had a specific person in mind. You can find them on the desk over there.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_REAUVERRE_000_006<tab>J'ai dit aux filles d'écrire chacune une lettre expliquant le genre de personne qu'elles voudraient rencontrer. Toutes leurs lettres sont là, sur le comptoir.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_REAUVERRE_000_007<tab>Read through them, and if there are any among your allies and comrades-in-arms who might be fit to call upon, don't hesitate to tell me and I'll gather everyone here.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_REAUVERRE_000_007<tab>Lisez-les, et dites-moi si leur contenu vous fait penser à quelqu'un. Je m'occuperai de réunir tout le monde pendant que vous irez chercher cette personne.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_008<tab>I am well aware of how much I am asking of you, but the smiles of the children shall be worth the effort. If you could invite even just one more of your illustrious companions, it would mean the world to everyone here, myself included.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_008<tab>Bien le <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((bonsoir)) ((bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((bonjour)) ((bonsoir)) /var>)) /var>, <var 08 E905 ((aventurière)) ((aventurier)) /var>. Si vous avez du temps devant vous, que direz-vous de jouer à nouveau les intermédiaires<var 1D /var>? Des petites filles attendent encore de rencontrer leur mentor.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_REAUVERRE_000_009<tab>The letters are still on the desk. I'm certain that among your friends there is at least one you can call.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_REAUVERRE_000_009<tab>Leurs lettres sont posées sur le comptoir.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_REAUVERRE_000_010<tab>If someone comes to mind, tell me and I'll arrange to have everyone gather here for an audience.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_REAUVERRE_000_010<tab>Lisez-les, et dites-moi si leur contenu vous fait penser à quelqu'un. Je m'occuperai de réunir tout le monde pendant que vous irez chercher cette personne.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_011<tab>Young Reauverre seems to have been inspired by your example, and declares to any who will listen that he too will be a model seneschal. It is heartening to see him in such high spirits.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_011<tab>Je ne sais pas s'il a pris exemple sur nous, mais Reauverre a décidé qu'il jouerait lui aussi le rôle de sénéchal, en aidant ses petites camarades.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_REAUVERRE_000_040<tab>So, have you read the letters? Do any of your storied allies fit the descriptions written within?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_REAUVERRE_000_040<tab>Ça y est, vous avez lu toutes les lettres<var 1D /var>? Vous avez une idée de qui vous pourriez inviter<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_Q2_000_000<tab>Savez-vous qui inviter<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_REAUVERRE_000_041<tab>Great! I'll call the girls here!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_REAUVERRE_000_041<tab>Génial<var 1D /var>! Je vais tout de suite prévenir les filles, à tout à l'heure<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_Q3_000_000<tab>Who will you bring?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_Q3_000_000<tab>Qui allez-vous inviter<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_A3_000_001<tab>The Sultana herself.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_A3_000_001<tab>La Sultane

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_A3_000_002<tab>The First Sword of the Gladiators' Guild.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_A3_000_002<tab>Une gladiatrice

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_A3_000_003<tab>A culinary magician.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_A3_000_003<tab>Un chef cuisinier

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_A3_000_004<tab>Ul'dah's top songstresses.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_A3_000_004<tab>Des chanteuses

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_A3_000_005<tab>A legendary aesthetician.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_A3_000_005<tab>Un esthéticien

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_A3_000_006<tab>My little dragon friend.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_A3_000_006<tab>Un dragon

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_A3_000_007<tab>Someone with deep pockets.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_A3_000_007<tab>Un parvenu♪

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_A3_000_008<tab>I'd like to reconsider.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_A3_000_008<tab>Annuler

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_NANAMOULNAMO_000_050<tab>Greetings, children. Is everyone having a splendid Little Ladies' Day?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_NANAMOULNAMO_000_050<tab><var 08 E905 ((Bonsoir)) ((Bonjour)) /var><var 1D /var>! Comment ça va, les enfants<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENA03851_000_051<tab>It's the sultana! We are honored to be in your presence, Your Grace!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENA03851_000_051<tab>V-votre Altesse<var 1D /var>! C'est vrrraiment vous<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_NANAMOULNAMO_000_052<tab>Now now, there is no need for such stiff formalities. Pray call me Nanamo. And it is I who should be so honored to receive your invitation.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_NANAMOULNAMO_000_052<tab>Bien sûr<var 1D /var>! Nous n'aurions refusé votre invitation pour rien au monde.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_NANAMOULNAMO_000_053<tab>For our children are the most precious gemstones in all of Ul'dah. I am sure there is much and more I can learn from your stories, and full eager am I to hear them.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_NANAMOULNAMO_000_053<tab>La plus grande richesse d'un pays, ce sont ses enfants. Aussi voulons-nous prendre le temps de faire con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce avec vous.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_PAPASHAN_000_054<tab>Your Grace, each moment we remain here, urgent matters are mounting and left unresolved. We would do best not to tarry overlong.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_PAPASHAN_000_054<tab>V-votre Altesse, votre agenda du jour est bien chargé. Je ne saurais que trop vous conseiller d'écourter autant que possible cette visite de courtoisie...

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_NANAMOULNAMO_000_055<tab>Papashan, do you forget the meaning of this day? For generations, the sultans of Ul'dah have put themselves at the complete disposal of their chosen princesses. Am I not beholden to the same tradition? Or do you mean to imply that a sultana cannot be a seneschal?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_NANAMOULNAMO_000_055<tab>Papashan, auriez-vous oublié que nous fêtons les demoiselles<var 1D /var>? La Sultane doit donner de son temps et de sa personne aux jeunes filles du peuple, c'est l'origine même de cette célébration. Ou bien insinueriez-vous que nous n'avons pas la stature du sultan Baldric<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_PAPASHAN_000_056<tab>I─ No, Your Grace, of course not!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_PAPASHAN_000_056<tab>J-je n'oserais pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_NANAMOULNAMO_000_057<tab>I am glad we have reached an understanding. Now, which one of you addressed their letter to me? Come forward, and I shall serve you as best I can.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_NANAMOULNAMO_000_057<tab>Bien. À présent, dites-moi<var 1D /var>: qui d'entre vous nous a écrit une jolie lettre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MYLLA_000_060<tab>My friend here tells me that one among you has it in their head to become a gladiator. Raise your hand so I can judge if it's fit to raise a sword.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MYLLA_000_060<tab>Alors... qui parmi vous rêve de devenir forte comme une gladiatrice<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENB03851_000_061<tab>Me, me!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENB03851_000_061<tab>Moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MYLLA_000_062<tab>Aye, that's an arm I'd fear swinging at me even on my best day. You have promise, but many a talented gladiator has seen their bright future smothered by the sands of the Coliseum. Would you like to know what separates the wheat from the chaff?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MYLLA_000_062<tab>Donc, c'est toi qui as écrit la lettre. Tu veux que je te révèle le secret pour être une dure à cuire, c'est ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MYLLA_000_063<tab>Much akin to how a sword must be sharpened daily, one's skill with it must be practiced often and with diligence. The very best of us do this and more─they train always with purpose. They've an image in their head of the gladiator they'll become on the morrow, the next moon, and the next summer.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MYLLA_000_063<tab>Eh bien c'est simple, il faut s'entraîner sans relâche. Mais pas que. Pour rester motivée, c'est aussi très important de garder un but précis en tête.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MYLLA_000_064<tab>Take this advice to heart, for it has guided me to where I am now, and I suspect will guide me further still. Now, imagine yourself with sword and shield in hand, ready to emerge victorious from your first tourney.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MYLLA_000_064<tab>Par exemple, mon but à moi est de m'améliorer pour me sentir plus proche d'un gladiateur que j'admire... Au fait, as-tu déjà vu un duel de gladiateurs<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENB03851_000_065<tab>A tourney? You mean at the Coliseum? I've always wanted to go to one, but my ma says it's too crowded─that it'll make my condition even worse. So...I've never been.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENB03851_000_065<tab>Ils ont lieu au Colisée, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Ma maman dit que c'est trop agité là-bas<var 1D /var>; que je risque d'être fatiguée si j'y vais...

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MYLLA_000_066<tab>I see. Imagine yourself facing down a different foe, then─this condition of yours. Imagine that you've trounced it so thoroughly that it would never dare to plague you again.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MYLLA_000_066<tab>Je vois... Eh bien puisque c'est comme ça, tu n'as qu'à te faire ton propre duel dans ta tête<var 1D /var>! Imagine que tu es une jeune gladiatrice et que la maladie est ton premier adversaire.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MYLLA_000_067<tab>Triumph over this enemy and take back your health, and I'll personally see to it that you're invited to a tourney showcasing the fiercest fighters in our guild.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MYLLA_000_067<tab>Une fois que tu l'auras vaincue, autrement dit, que tu seras guérie, je viendrai te chercher et on ira toutes les deux voir un vrai duel cette fois, livré par l'un des gladiateurs de ma guilde. Ça te va comme ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENB03851_000_068<tab>Oh! Really!?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENB03851_000_068<tab>V-vous êtes sérieuse<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MYLLA_000_069<tab>My word is as good as my sword. All I ask is that you put my advice into practice daily. Your first victory is yours for the taking.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MYLLA_000_069<tab>Bien sûr<var 1D /var>! J'ai vraiment hâte d'y être, alors dépêche-toi d'aller mieux, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENB03851_000_070<tab>Of course, I promise!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENB03851_000_070<tab>Oh oui<var 1D /var>! Je vais me battre de toutes mes forces<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_LYNGSATH_000_080<tab>Oi, now I see why they call Ul'dah a jewel─it's got the prettiest little lasses this side o' Eorzea! Now who 'ere's the one with a taste for cakes and cookies?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_LYNGSATH_000_080<tab>Alors comme ça, l'une de vous aimerait que je goûte à ses gâteaux<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENC03851_000_081<tab>Me, sir. Is it true you know how to cook?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENC03851_000_081<tab>C'est moi. Mais, hum... vous êtes vraiment cuisinier<var 1D /var>? Vous ressemblez plus à... je sais pas, un bûcheron...

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_LYNGSATH_000_082<tab>Hahaha! Aye, ye could say that. I've been known to whip up a dish or two when the fancy strikes me. Some've even asked me to cook whole meals for them, if ye can believe it─and then they asked for more!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_LYNGSATH_000_082<tab>Ha, un bûcheron<var 1D /var>! On me l'avait jamais faite, celle-là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_LYNGSATH_000_083<tab>In fact, so many couldn't get their fill of my cookin' that I stumbled into the position of guildmaster for the culinarians. Ever 'eard of the Bismarck? I'm somethin' of a known quantity there, and we're always lookin' for talent. I understand yer a dab 'and in the kitchen yerself.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_LYNGSATH_000_083<tab>Eh bien oui, tu as devant toi le maître de la guilde des cuisiniers et le chef du restaurant Le Bismarck. Si j'en crois ta lettre, tu es une grande amoureuse des gâteaux, c'est bien ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENC03851_000_084<tab>I...I suppose. I like to make sweets, and one day I hope to open my own shop.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENC03851_000_084<tab>Oh oui<var 1D /var>! Mon rêve, c'est d'ouvrir un jour ma propre pâtisserie.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_LYNGSATH_000_085<tab>That's a worthy road to walk down, if I do say so myself. Ye'll lose track o' 'ow many days you've spent bent o'er an oven, 'owever, but I suspect that won't deter ye.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_LYNGSATH_000_085<tab>Hoho... En voilà, une petite qui a de l'ambition. Dans ce cas, tu vas devoir travailler, et pas qu'un peu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_LYNGSATH_000_086<tab>Now that's the attitude I like to see. Now, lass, I came all this way on the promise o' cake─one that'd put the Bismarck's to shame. Would ye care to oblige me?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_LYNGSATH_000_086<tab>Bon, c'est pas tout ça mais j'ai un petit creux. Et si on passait à la dégustation<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_SYSTEM_100_110<tab>The royal seneschal is in charge of all matters related to the Songbirds, famed songstresses of Ul'dah. He may be able to arrange an audience with them.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_SYSTEM_100_110<tab>Le sénéchal royal est le producteur des Églantines d'Ul'dah. Par son intermédiaire, vous parvenez à convaincre ces dernières de venir à la clinique...

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_ULALA_000_110<tab>Now this is a crowd! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you didn't tell us there would be so many of them! Greetings, everyone, and thank you for having us! Who wants an autograph!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_ULALA_000_110<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Bonsoir)) ((Bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Bonjour)) ((Bonsoir)) /var>)) /var> tout le monde<var 1D /var>! On vient rendre visite à l'une de nos fans<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_NARUMI_000_111<tab>Ulala, show a little restraint, please. We're in a sick ward, not on the stage.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_NARUMI_000_111<tab>Moins fort, Ulala<var 1D /var>! Nous sommes dans une clinique, pas une salle de concert<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_112<tab>Let's keep civil in front of the children, shall we? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> told us one of you little ladies wishes to be a songstress when she grows up. Which of you is it?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_112<tab>Est-ce que la jeune fille qui nous a écrit une lettrrre pourrait se désigner<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_ULALA_000_113<tab>Wow, look at her! She'd fit right in with the Songbirds! Who's your favorite? It's okay, you can be honest─it's me, isn't it?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_ULALA_000_113<tab>Merci, ça nous a fait rudement plaisir<var 1D /var>! Juste par curiosité<var 1D /var>: laquelle de nous trois tu préfères<var 1D /var>? Allez, tu as le droit de dire que c'est moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_NARUMI_000_114<tab>I'm sure there are other things she'd like to talk about. Tell us, what made you want to follow in our footsteps?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_NARUMI_000_114<tab>Alors comme ça, tu voudrais devenir chanteuse<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENE03851_000_115<tab>I saw you perform once in Ul'dah, and by the end of the first song I knew what I wanted to be. Your voices, your dances, your costumes─everything was so enchanting.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENE03851_000_115<tab>Oui, c'est mon rêve depuis que je vous ai vues toutes les trois sur scène<var 1D /var>! Vous chantez et vous dansez tellement bien, ça m'a donné envie de m'y mettre, moi aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_116<tab>Really? Thank you for the kind words, truly. As a performer, there is no greater gift than the heartfelt appreciation of a fan.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_116<tab>C'est un grand honneurrr de savoir qu'il y a des petites filles comme toi qui nous prennent en modèle.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_ULALA_000_117<tab>True, but being a songstress isn't all sunshine and lemoncakes. And becoming one was even less sweet. There were many hardships to overcome to get to where we are now, and certainly more are still ahead.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_ULALA_000_117<tab>... Oui enfin, attention quand même<var 1D /var>: la vie de chanteuse n'est pas toute rose. Il y a aussi des moments difficiles, dans lesquels il faut savoir serrer les dents et continuer à donner au public ce qu'il attend.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_ULALA_000_118<tab>On the stage, we're perfect. But it takes effort off the stage to get there. Day after day for bells on end we practice. You have to be ready to endure that and more.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_ULALA_000_118<tab>Les gens ne s'en rendent pas forcément compte, mais derrière chaque concert, il y a des heures et des heures de travail acharné. De la sueur, du sang et même parfois des larmes... Est-ce que ça te fait toujours envie<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_NARUMI_000_119<tab>Ulala! She is but a child!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_NARUMI_000_119<tab>U-Ulala, enfin<var 1D /var>! Ce n'est pas une manière de présenter les choses à une enfant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_120<tab>While Ulala's words may be blunt, there is wisdom in them. If we inspired this girl, don't we owe her honesty? Would that I was given the same gift when I was younger.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_120<tab>Non, elle a raison. Si la petite veut vraiment perrrcer, alors il vaut mieux qu'elle sache la réalité du métier le plus tôt possible.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_121<tab>Not that I would've chosen any other path than this. Quite the opposite, in fact. For every moment of suffering there are countless more of fulfillment. Like this one, for example. Meeting our fans is always an occasion to hold dear.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_121<tab>Rassure-toi, c'est beaucoup d'efforrrts, mais il y a aussi de vrais moments de récompense... comme celui-ci.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_ULALA_000_122<tab>That's right, I wouldn't dissuade any from pursuing their dream of becoming a songstress. Stay determined and practice every day, and before long I'm sure we'll see you on the stage with us!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_ULALA_000_122<tab>Cramponne-toi à tes ambitions, ne lâche rien, et ce sera ton tour de monter sur scène dans quelques années. On pourra même donner un concert ensemble si ça te dit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENE03851_000_123<tab>I will! Thank you!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENE03851_000_123<tab>Bien sûr, ce serait géant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_ULALA_000_124<tab>But let me warn you─if you aim to be Eorzea's number one songstress, you'll have to face some stiff competition!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_ULALA_000_124<tab>Par contre, gare à toi si tu cherches à me faire de l'ombre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDREND03851_000_090<tab>Who...who is this?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDREND03851_000_090<tab>Euh... C'est vous, l'esthéticien<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_091<tab>Ah, I see there are still drab corners of the world where the name of Jandelaine has yet to grace the people's tongues.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_091<tab>Tout à fait<var 1D /var>! Jandelaine, pour vous servir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_092<tab>Not to worry, my dear ladies─by now I am well accustomed to the feat of delivering the light of beauty to Eorzea's darkest recesses!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_092<tab>Et ça, ce sont mes ciseaux<var 1D /var>! Attention, mes chéries, ça va couper<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDREND03851_000_093<tab>Uh, this is an aesthetician? He's not like I imagined...
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDREND03851_000_093<tab>... Est-ce que tous les esthéticiens sont comme <var 1A 02 /var>ça<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_094<tab>Look carefully upon this visage, and then carefully inside yourself. Do so, and you shall come to see the truth.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_094<tab>Petite, j'ai une question pour toi... Attention, tu dois y répondre sans détour<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_095<tab>Not the truth of prosaic reality. No─the truth of the heart! The one truth that can stir your soul and transform it from dull to dashing. Will you dare to accept it, or will you forever consign yourself to mediocrity?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_095<tab>Est-ce que tu penses qu'une vie monotone et dénuée de fantaisie vaille la peine d'être vécue<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_096<tab>Excellent, my lass. Then take hold of your scissors─figuratively, of course─and prepare to shear your ideal self free from the fabric of the common and shape it into something wondrous, as only an aesthetician can.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_096<tab>Dans ce cas, es-tu prête à te consacrer corps et âme à la poursuite de ton rêve, celui de devenir esthéticienne<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_097<tab>Now, I shall excise the demon of ugliness from atop your crown, and you shall return to us a beauty reborn!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_097<tab>Fort bien... Puisqu'il en est ainsi, je vais t'offrir la renaissance que tu mérites<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_098<tab>Bid farewell to the life you knew, and prepare to see the world from a vantage placed squarely above the clamoring masses!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_098<tab>Approche, que je fasse parler la coupe<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_099<tab>Breathtaking...more lovely than words can say. No, you must not speak─you must bask in the moment.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_099<tab>Alors, ma chère future consœur... heureuse<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_100<tab>Today you step foot upon a new path─a path that will lead you to a beauty so profound that you shall have no choice but to one day join me in my quest to banish all hints of the grotesque from the land.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_JANDELAINE_000_100<tab>Et un joyeux anniversaire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_130<tab>So many children! Is this what you call a litter?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_130<tab>Ouah<var 1D /var>! Plein de petites humaines<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENF03851_000_131<tab>(-Awestruck Girl-)Is that...is that a dragon!? I can't believe it! It sure is small... It's not a poppet, is it?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENF03851_000_131<tab>(-Petite Miqo'te-)Ouah, un bébé drrragon<var 1D /var>! C'est un vrai<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_132<tab>Can a poppet speak, child of man? I am indeed a dragon, and you may call me Kal Myhk.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_132<tab>Hé<var 1D /var>! Moi, c'est Kal Myhk, pas “un bébé drrragon”<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENA03851_000_133<tab>(-Awestruck Girl-)Wow, it talks! Why are you so small? Are you a child like us?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENA03851_000_133<tab>(-Petite Miqo'te-)Trop forrrt, il parle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_134<tab>Hmph. If it pleases you to think of me as a child, then you may do so. What is it you children of men do for leisure, again? If I recall correctly, scampering about aimlessly outside is a pastime of yours. I suppose I could deign to scamper. What say you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_134<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, et si on allait tous dehors<var 1D /var>? On aurait plus de place pour s'amuser<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENB03851_000_135<tab>(-Hyuran Child-)But the physicians said we can't go outside...
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENB03851_000_135<tab>(-Petit Hyur-)On n'a pas le droit...

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_136<tab>Nonsense. Every child must bask in the sunlight from time to time. How else would they grow big and strong like my friend <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_136<tab>Hein, pourquoi<var 1D /var>!? Me dites pas que vous êtes punies<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENB03851_000_137<tab>(-Hyuran Child-)We'd like nothing more than to go play, but we're sick. It might not look it now, but our condition can change in a moment's turn. We have to stay inside or else we might get worse.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENB03851_000_137<tab>(-Petit Hyur-)Ça se voit pas, mais on est malades. On peut pas quitter l'Académie, désolée...

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_138<tab>I see. How unfortunate. I was looking forward to making new friends and catching up with old ones.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_138<tab>Bah mince alors... J'aurais bien aimé jouer avec vous. Et avec <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> aussi, ça fait longtemps qu'on s'est pas vus...

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_139<tab>Still, that doesn't mean I can't return when you all are well. A day which will come soon, I'm sure.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_139<tab>... Bon, c'est pas grave. Je reviendrai quand vous aurez la permission de sortir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_140<tab>And when it does, we'll scamper enough to make up for today thrice over!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_140<tab>Dépêchez-vous d'aller mieux, comme ça on pourra tous s'amuser au grand air<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_141<tab>Don't worry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> will be coming along too. I'll see to it personally.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_141<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Tu viendras aussi, hein<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_142<tab>It's a promise, then. And dragons never break a promise, even should a thousand winters pass. I hope to see you all before then, however, else I may no longer fit inside this tiny structure.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_KALMYHK_000_142<tab>... Bien sûr que tu vas venir<var 1D /var>! On n'est pas amis pour rien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_150<tab>Well met, well met! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> told me to expect princesses, but I see now that the word hardly does this singular group of ladies justice!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_150<tab>Ouah<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, vous aviez dit vrai. Ça en fait, des fillettes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENF03851_000_151<tab>(-Gawking Girl-)My gods, a Namaz!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENF03851_000_151<tab>(-Petite Hyure-)C'est... un Mamazu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_152<tab>That's Nama<var 1A 02 /var>zu<var 1A 01 /var>, young lady, and we do have names. Yes, yes. Mine is Gyorin, and the pleasure of making your acquaintance is entirely mine.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_152<tab>On dit un <var 1A 02 /var>Namazu<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>! Et pas n'importe lequel... Gyorin, le seul, l'unique<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_153<tab>Now, I've heard tell there was a girl here with ambitions of slumbering upon piles of coins and awakening in the lap of luxury.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_153<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> m'a dit que l'une de vous souhaitait devenir riche<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENF03851_000_154<tab>(-Gawking Girl-)Me! Me! I wanna be rich!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENF03851_000_154<tab>(-Petite Hyure-)Ah oui, c'est moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_155<tab>Ah, I know that glint in your eyes, for I had the same one in mine when I was your age─and truth be told, I still do! It's so rare to meet kindred spirits these days─ones that aren't trying to bankrupt me, that is!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_155<tab>Hoho... Si jeune et déjà si cupi... ambitieuse<var 1D /var>? Tu me plais déjà<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_156<tab>The first step to making a ponze of gold is to know your purpose, for that will serve to spur you forward when your fortunes are down and your coinpurse is empty.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_156<tab>Mais dis-moi... Pourquoi tu veux être pleine aux as<var 1D /var>? Tu as un projet précis en tête<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENF03851_000_157<tab>(-Gawking Girl-)Well, I heard my parents arguing about how much it costs to keep me here... I felt so guilty...
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENF03851_000_157<tab>(-Petite Hyure-)Eh bien... mes parents payent très cher pour me faire soigner ici, à l'Académie. Je les ai entendus en parler une fois...

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENF03851_000_158<tab>(-Gawking Girl-)But I also realized how hard they were trying for me. That's when I decided to become rich─so I could make their life easy. I wanna get out of here and show them every corner of Eorzea!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_CHILDRENF03851_000_158<tab>(-Petite Hyure-)Si j'étais riche, ils pourraient garder leur argent pour se faire plaisir. D'ailleurs, j'aimerais bien nous offrir un tour du monde en famille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_159<tab>Ah, a more noble goal than most that go into the business of making money! That nobility will serve to help you survive through the lean times─and lean times there will be! Even I am yet to count myself among the affluent and well-to-do. But a Namazu can dream, and dream I shall! Yes, yes!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_159Je comprends mieux, c'était de l'amour filial! C'est beau.♪
Mais tu sais, le chemin de la fortune est long et semé d'embûches. Moi-même, mes affaires vont cahin-caha...

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_160<tab>That being said, if your aim is to fill your coffers, there's no better place than Ul'dah. Fortunes are made and lost every bell in this city, and a savvy merchant can massage the odds so that she wins more than she loses.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_160<tab>Pas de panique. Ul'dah est le paradis des marchands à ce que l'on dit. Tu auras cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment moult occasions de t'en mettre plein les poches<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_161<tab>Since you already have a purpose to drive you, your next step is to find a market. That requires research─dozens and dozens of conversations to discern what will sell and what's better off left buried in the sand. And even when you're not researching, you must be <var 1A 02 /var>thinking<var 1A 01 /var> about your research.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_161<tab>Tiens, tu veux connaître le secret d'un bon commerçant<var 1D /var>? C'est de bien repérer à l'avance quels produits vont bien se vendre. Pour ça, il faut discuter avec un maximum de gens et se creuser les méninges jour après jour<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_162<tab>Begin your journey with this simple advice in mind and soon riches shall flow to you. Should you succeed─which I'm sure you will─please visit me in Hingashi. I've no doubt two merchants of our aptitude can turn a mountain of coins into an ocean of them!
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_GYORIN_000_162<tab>Une fois que tu auras fait florès, tu pourras me rendre visite en Orient et me remercier du conseil... de préférence avec un contrat de partenariat exclusif sous le bras<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_REAUVERRE_000_163<tab>Now that was a sight to see! Who <var 1A 02 /var>don't<var 1A 01 /var> you know, friend?
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_REAUVERRE_000_163<tab>Je vous envie de connaître autant de monde... Et que des gens in<var 16 /var>té<var 16 /var>res<var 16 /var>sants, en plus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_170<tab>I must admit, when I first requested your aid, 'twas out of desperation. I expected at best a short letter to read to the children, but you went the extra malm and provided us with an audience. I cannot remember the last time I saw everyone so happy.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_170<tab>Cette nouvelle visite a fait ex<var 16 /var>trê<var 16 /var>me<var 16 /var>ment plaisir aux enfants. Je le sais, j'ai vu des étoiles briller dans leurs yeux.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_171<tab>Joy was not the only gift you gave everyone, however. The heartening words of your allies will fortify the children's spirits in the days ahead, that they might overcome their illnesses and see their health returned. Please pass on our gratitude to your friends.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_171<tab>Nous pouvons remercier notre hôte d'avoir fait le déplacement. Par ailleurs, je suis certain que ses quelques mots auront donné du courage à nos jeunes patientes.

source: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_172<tab>And allow me to thank you personally. Your efforts have ensured that this Little Ladies' Day will always be remembered fondly by both the children and myself. You are welcome to visit us here any time you wish, and all the more welcome if you have another companion in tow.
target: TEXT_FESPDY602_03851_DAMIELLIOT_000_172<tab>Il n'empêche, je suis im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>né par le nombre et la qualité de vos relations... Si vous pensez pouvoir faire d'autres heureuses, surtout n'hésitez pas<var 1D /var>!
